          articleGoodShot.cnt AS goodShotCnt,\n                 U.id                AS userId,\n                 U.nickname          AS nickname,\n                 F.att               AS file,\n                 A.created_at        AS createdAt,\n                 A.deleted_at        AS deletedAt,\n                 A.delete_reason     AS deleteReason\n          FROM articles AS A\n\n                 LEFT JOIN users AS U ON A.user_id = U.id\n\n                 LEFT JOIN (SELECT used_by, COUNT(id) AS att\n                            FROM attaches\n                            WHERE used_as = 'ARTICLE_CONTENT'\n                            GROUP BY used_by) AS F ON F.used_by = A.id\n\n                 LEFT JOIN (SELECT article_id, COUNT(id) AS cnt\n                            FROM     A.created_at        AS createdAt,\n                 A.deleted_at        AS deletedAt,\n                 A.delete_reason     AS deleteReason\n          FROM articles AS A\n\n                 LEFT JOIN users AS U ON A.user_id = U.id\n\n                 LEFT JOIN (SELECT used_by, COUNT(id) AS att\n                            FROM attaches\n                            WHERE used_as = 'ARTICLE_CONTENT'\n                            GROUP BY used_by) AS F ON F.used_by = A.id\n\n                 LEFT JOIN (SELECT article_id, COUNT(id) AS cnt\n                            FROM comments\n                            GROUP BY article_id) AS articleCmt ON articleCmt.article_id = A.id\n\n                 LEFT JOIN(SELECT target_id, COUNT(id) AS cnt\n                           FROM good_shot\n                           WHERE target_entity = 'ARTICLE'\n                           GROUP BY target_entity, target_id) AS articleGoodShot ON articleGoodShot.target_id = A.id\n  \n        WHERE \n      (MATCH( A.category) AGAINST('free' IN BOOLEAN MODE)) \n      \n          \n        AND A.id NOT IN (\n          SELECT target_id FROM blocks WHERE target_entity = 'Article' AND (user_id = 'e260c78b-304c-4add-87f6-7a5220a97d41' OR user_id = 'SYSTEM')\n        ) AND A.user_id NOT IN (\n          SELECT target_id FROM blocks WHERE target_entity = 'User' AND (user_id = 'e260c78b-304c-4add-87f6-7a5220a97d41' OR user_id = 'SYSTEM')\n        )\n      \n          AND (A.deleted_at IS NULL OR (A.deleted_at IS NOT NULL AND A.delete_reason <> 'USER_SELF'))\n          AND A.status = 'ACTIVE'\n          AND user_id = 'e260c78b-304c-4add-87f6-7a5220a97d41' AND category <> 'blue-tee' AND category <> 'red-tee'\n        ORDER BY A.created_at DESC LIMIT 0, 20 ;\n        \n        SELECT COUNT(1) AS total FROM articles AS A\n        WHERE \n      (MATCH( A.category) AGAINST('free' IN BOOLEAN MODE)) \n      \n          \n        AND A.id NOT IN (\n          SELECT target_id FROM blocks WHERE target_entity = 'Article' AND (user_id = 'e260c78b-304c-4add-87f6-7a5220a97d41' OR user_id = 'SYSTEM')\n        ) AND A.user_id NOT IN (\n          SELECT target_id FROM blocks WHERE target_entity = 'User' AND (user_id = 'e260c78b-304c-4add-87f6-7a5220a97d41' OR user_id = 'SYSTEM')\n        )\n      \n          AND (A.deleted_at IS NULL OR (A.deleted_at IS NOT NULL AND A.delete_reason <> 'USER_SELF'))\n          AND A.status = 'ACTIVE'\n          AND user_id = 'e260c78b-304c-4add-87f6-7a5220a97d41' AND category <> 'blue-tee' AND category <> 'red-tee';\n      "

          A.created_at        AS createdAt,\n                 A.deleted_at        AS deletedAt,\n                 A.delete_reason     AS deleteReason\n          FROM articles AS A\n\n 'ARTICLE_CONTENT'\n                            GROUP BY used_by) AS F ON F.used_by = A.id\n\n                 LEFT JOIN (SELECT article_id, COUNT(id) AS cnt\n                            FROM comments\n                            GROUP BY article_id) AS articleCmt ON articleCmt.article_id = A.id\n\n                 LEFT JOIN(SELECT target_id, COUNT(id) AS cnt\n                           FROM good_shot\n                           WHERE target_entity = 'ARTICLE'\n                           GROUP BY target_entity, target_id) AS articleGoodShot ON articleGoodShot.target_id = A.id\n  \n        WHERE \n      (MATCH( A.id) AGAINST('' IN BOOLEAN MODE)) \n      \n          \n        AND A.id NOT IN (\n          SELECT target_id FROM blocks WHERE target_entity = 'Article' AND (user_id = 'a3c022c7-c1bb-451f-be21-11a7a066f068' OR user_id = 'SYSTEM')\n        ) AND A.user_id NOT IN (\n          SELECT target_id FROM blocks WHERE target_entity = 'User' AND (user_id = 'a3c022c7-c1bb-451f-be21-11a7a066f068' OR user_id = 'SYSTEM')\n        )\n      \n          AND (A.deleted_at IS NULL OR (A.deleted_at IS NOT NULL AND A.delete_reason <> 'USER_SELF'))\n          AND A.status = 'ACTIVE'\n          AND user_id = '3419bbfb-28d5-4ec7-af80-372dfb9d9258' AND category <> 'blue-tee' AND category <> 'red-tee'\n        ORDER BY A.created_at DESC LIMIT 0, 20 ;\n        \n        SELECT COUNT(1) AS total FROM articles AS A\n        WHERE \n      (MATCH( A.id) AGAINST('' IN BOOLEAN MODE)) \n      \n          \n        AND A.id NOT IN (\n          SELECT target_id FROM blocks WHERE target_entity = 'Article' AND (user_id = 'a3c022c7-c1bb-451f-be21-11a7a066f068' OR user_id = 'SYSTEM')\n        ) AND A.user_id NOT IN (\n          SELECT target_id FROM blocks WHERE target_entity = 'User' AND (user_id = 'a3c022c7-c1bb-451f-be21-11a7a066f068' OR user_id = 'SYSTEM')\n        )\n      \n          AND (A.deleted_at IS NULL OR (A.deleted_at IS NOT NULL AND A.delete_reason <> 'USER_SELF'))\n          AND A.status = 'ACTIVE'\n          AND user_id = '3419bbfb-28d5-4ec7-af80-372dfb9d9258' AND category <> 'blue-tee' AND category <> 'red-tee';\n      "
  },
  "time": "2025-10-14T14:43:54.373Z"
}```
